== Kadaba (611877) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kadaba is a village in the [[Gubbi ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 436.55 hectares and harbouring 869 households with total population of 3573 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Gubbi]] is at a distance of 18 km. Male population is 1759 and female population is 1814. Scheduled Caste Population is 613 and Scheduled Tribes population is 96. Census Location Code of the village is 611877<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 2625 (73.47%)
* Literate male population: 1397 (79.42%)
* Literate female population: 1228 (67.7%)
